analyzed: so āyasmataḥ sāriputtassa pāde sirasā vandati iti

original: Yena cāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so puriso āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:

original: “kacci te, gahapati, khamanīyaṁ, kacci yāpanīyaṁ? Kacci te dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti, no abhikkamanti; paṭikkamosānaṁ paññāyati, no abhikkamo”ti?
analyzed: kacci te gahapati khamanīya kacci yāpanīya kacci te dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti no abhikkamanti paṭikkama usānam paññāyati no abhikkama uti

original: “Na me, bhante sāriputta, khamanīyaṁ na yāpanīyaṁ. Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti; abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati, no paṭikkamo.
analyzed: na me bhante sāriputta khamanīyam na yāpanīya bāḷhā me dukkhāḥ vedanāḥ abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti abhikkama usānam paññāyati no paṭikkamaḥ

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante sāriputta, balavā puriso tiṇhena sikharena muddhani abhimattheyya; evameva kho me, bhante sāriputta, adhimattā vātā muddhani ūhananti.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhante sāriputta balavā purisaḥ tiṇhena sikharena muddhani abhimattheyya evam eva kho me bhante sāriputta adhimattāḥ vātāḥ muddhani ūhananti

original: Na me, bhante sāriputta, khamanīyaṁ na yāpanīyaṁ. Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti; abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati, no paṭikkamo.
analyzed: na me bhante sāriputta khamanīyam na yāpanīya bāḷhā me dukkhāḥ vedanāḥ abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti abhikkama usānam paññāyati no paṭikkamaḥ

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante sāriputta, balavā puriso daḷhena varattakhaṇḍena sīse sīsaveṭhaṁ dadeyya; evameva kho me, bhante sāriputta, adhimattā sīse sīsavedanā.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhante sāriputta balavā purisaḥ daḷhena varatta khaṇḍena sīse sīsa veṭham dadeyya evam eva kho me bhante sāriputta adhimattā sīse sīsa vedanā

original: Na me, bhante sāriputta, khamanīyaṁ na yāpanīyaṁ. Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti; abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati, no paṭikkamo.
analyzed: na me bhante sāriputta khamanīyam na yāpanīya bāḷhā me dukkhāḥ vedanāḥ abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti abhikkama usānam paññāyati no paṭikkamaḥ

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante sāriputta, dakkho goghātako vā goghātakantevāsī vā tiṇhena govikantanena
analyzed: seyyathā api bhante sāriputta dakkhaḥ go ghātakaḥ vā go ghāta kantevāsī vā tiṇhena go vikantanena

original: kucchiṁ parikanteyya; evameva kho me, bhante sāriputta, adhimattā vātā kucchiṁ parikantanti.
analyzed: kucchim parikanteyya evam eva kho me bhante sāriputta adhimattāḥ vātāḥ kucchim parikantanti

original: Na me, bhante sāriputta, khamanīyaṁ na yāpanīyaṁ. Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti; abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati, no paṭikkamo.
analyzed: na me bhante sāriputta khamanīyam na yāpanīya bāḷhā me dukkhāḥ vedanāḥ abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti abhikkama usānam paññāyati no paṭikkamaḥ

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante sāriputta, dve balavanto purisā dubbalataraṁ purisaṁ nānābāhāsu
analyzed: seyyathā api bhante sāriputta dve balavantaḥ purisāḥ dubbalataram purisam nānā bāhāsu

original: gahetvā aṅgārakāsuyā santāpeyyuṁ, samparitāpeyyuṁ; evameva kho me, bhante sāriputta,

original: Evaṁ vutte, anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati parodi, assūni pavattesi.

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando anāthapiṇḍikaṁ gahapatiṁ etadavoca:

original: “olīyasi kho tvaṁ, gahapati, saṁsīdasi kho tvaṁ, gahapatī”ti?
analyzed: olīyasi khalu tva gahapati sasīdasi khalu tva gahapati iti
na aha bhante ānanda olīyāmi na api sasīdāmi

original: api ca me dīgharattaṁ satthā payirupāsito manobhāvanīyā ca bhikkhū;
analyzed: api ca me dīgharattam satthā payirupāsitaḥ manaḥ bhāvanīyā ca bhikkhū

original: na ca me evarūpī dhammī kathā sutapubbā”ti.
analyzed: na ca me evarūpī dhammī kathā suta pubbā ati

original: “Na kho, gahapati, gihīnaṁ odātavasanānaṁ evarūpī dhammī kathā paṭibhāti;
analyzed: na kho gahapati gihīnam odāta vasanānam evarūpī dhammī kathā paṭibhāti

original: pabbajitānaṁ kho, gahapati, evarūpī dhammī kathā paṭibhātī”ti.
analyzed: pabbajitānam kho gahapati evarūpī dhammī kathā paṭibhāti iti

original: “Tena hi, bhante sāriputta, gihīnampi odātavasanānaṁ evarūpī dhammī kathā paṭibhātu.
analyzed: tena hi bhante sāriputta gihīnam pi odāta vasanānam evarūpī dhammī kathā paṭibhātu

original: Santi hi, bhante, kulaputtā apparajakkhajātikā, assavanatā dhammassa parihāyanti;
analyzed: santi hi bhante kula puttāḥ appara jakkha jātikāḥ assavana tā dhammassa parihāyanti

original: Atha kho āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca ānando anāthapiṇḍikaṁ gahapatiṁ iminā ovādena ovaditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā ca sāriputtaḥ āyasmā ca ānandaḥ anāthapiṇḍikam gahapatim iminā ovādena ovaditvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkamisu

original: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati, acirapakkante āyasmante ca sāriputte āyasmante ca ānande, kālamakāsi tusitaṁ kāyaṁ upapajji.
analyzed: atha kho anāthapiṇḍikaḥ gahapati acira pakkante āyasmante ca sāriputte āyasmante ca ānande kālam akāsi tusitam kāyam upapajji

original: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ
analyzed: atha kho anāthapiṇḍikaḥ deva puttaḥ abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkanta vaṇṇaḥ kevala kappa

original: jetavanaṁ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: jetavanam obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto bhagavantaṁ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi:
analyzed: ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho anāthapiṇḍikaḥ devaputtaḥ bhagavantam gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi
idam hi tam jetavana
isi saṅgha nisevita
āvuttham dhammarājena
pīti sañjananam mama
kammam vijjā ca dhammo ca
sīlam jīvitam uttama
etena maccā sujjhanti
na gottena dhanena vā
tasmā hi paṇḍitaḥ posaḥ
sampassam atthamattano
yonisaḥ vicine dhamma
evam tattha visujjhati
sāriputtaḥ uva paññāya
sīlena upasamena ca
yaḥ api pāraṅgataḥ bhikkhu
etau aparamaḥ siyāti
idam avoca anāthapiṇḍikaḥ deva putto
samanuññaḥ satthā ahosi
atha kho anāthapiṇḍikaḥ deva putto

original: “samanuñño me satthā”ti bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
analyzed: samanuññaḥ me satthā iti bhagavantam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā tattha iva antaradhāyi

original: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyāḥ accayena bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “imaṁ, bhikkhave, rattiṁ aññataro devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo
analyzed: bhikkhave rattim aññataraḥ deva putto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkanta vaṇṇo

original: kevalakappaṁ jetavanaṁ obhāsetvā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā maṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: kevalakappam jetavanam obhāsetvā yena aham tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā mama abhivādetvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho so devaputto maṁ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi:
analyzed: ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho saḥ devaputto mam gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi
idam hi tam jetavana
isi saṅgha nisevita
āvuttham dhammarājena
pīti sañjananam mama
kammam vijjā ca dhammo ca
sīlam jīvitam uttama
etena maccā sujjhanti
na gottena dhanena vā
tasmā hi paṇḍitaḥ posaḥ
sampassam atthamattano
yonisaḥ vicine dhamma
evam tattha visujjhati
sāriputtaḥ uva paññāya
sīlena upasamena ca
yaḥ api pāraṅgataḥ bhikkhu
etau aparamaḥ siyāti
idam avoca bhikkhave so deva putto

original: ‘Samanuñño me satthā’ti maṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyī”ti.
analyzed: samanuññaḥ me satthā ati mam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā tattha iva antaradhāyi iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “so hi nūna so, bhante, anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto bhavissati.
analyzed: saḥ hi nūna saḥ bhante anāthapiṇḍikaḥ devaputto bhavissati

original: Anāthapiṇḍiko, bhante, gahapati āyasmante sāriputte abhippasanno ahosī”ti.
analyzed: anāthapiṇḍikaḥ bhante gahapati āyasmante sāriputte abhippasannaḥ ahosi iti
sādhu sādhu ānanda

original: Yāvatakaṁ kho, ānanda, takkāya pattabbaṁ, anuppattaṁ taṁ tayā.
analyzed: yāvatakam kho ānanda takkāya an uppattam tam tayā
anāthapiṇḍiko so ānanda deva putto ti
idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamano āyasmā ānando bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
analyzed: āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandi iti
anāthapiṇḍikovāda suttam niṭṭhitam paṭhama
